rows.label: tlk4170042101_msg0001
tlk4170042101_msg0002
rows.name:
I am putting the natural beauty of Gula
into words.

rows.label: tlk4170042101_msg0003
rows.name:
I would like for the city's children to also richly
express the scenery of their homeland, but...

rows.label: tlk4170042101_msg0004
rows.name:
It seems they all prefer to feel nature with their bodies
rather than spin words, so I am ignored...
